code: class  Solution  {   public :     int  numberOfSubstrings ( string  s )  {   int  ans  =  0 ;   vector < int >  count ( 3 );   int  l  =  0 ;   for  ( const  char  c  :  s )  {   ++ count [ c  -  'a' ];   while  ( count [ 0 ]  >  0  &&  count [ 1 ]  >  0  &&  count [ 2 ]  >  0 )   -- count [ s [ l ++ ]  -  'a' ];     ans  +=  l ;   }   return  ans ;   }  };
